admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Industrial Modernization
            Project willist in financing the modernization and expansion
            of three industrial enterprises: Zavodi Crvena Zastava,
            which manufactures automobiles; Zeljezara Sisak, which
            produces steel tubes; and Industria Poljoprivrednih Masina,
            which produces combine harvesters and automotive wheels.
